name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab page with Golan Heights photo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unique photos of Golan Heights by Yair Aronshtam

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens a new tab with a beautiful Golan photo (random photo every time).
In addition, the frequently visited sites links are on the left.
(In case you don't want the frequently visited sites to be displayed, you can hide them from extension "Options").
All photos are from Yair Aronshtam.
